abstract: Highlights of Frederic Rzewksi's compositions and political events that inspired them listed.
lead_paragraph: These five works by Frederic Rzewski address issues dear to his heart — and reflect his deep convictions.

headline.main: A Primer to One of America’s Most Political Composers
